# AssemblyLoader.LoadAll method

Load all assemblies embedded in the calling assembly.

```csharp
public static void LoadAll(string prefix = "faithlife.embedded-assembly.")
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| prefix | The resource name prefix to look for when finding assemblies to load. |
